name: n-get
description: Wget like CLI Tool done with Node.js

scripts.test: mocha test/configCommandsSpec.js test/configManagerSpec.js test/chdirSpec.js test/getDestinationSpec.js test/historyCommandsSpec.js test/historyManagerSpec.js test/ipv6UtilsSpec.js test/uriManagerIPv6Spec.js test/uriMangerSpec.js test/logging/json-format/jsonLoggingSpec.js test/logging/csv-format/csvLoggingSpec.js test/logging/text-format/textLoggingSpec.js --timeout 10000
scripts.test:unit: mocha test/configCommandsSpec.js test/configManagerSpec.js test/chdirSpec.js test/getDestinationSpec.js test/historyCommandsSpec.js test/historyManagerSpec.js test/ipv6UtilsSpec.js test/uriManagerIPv6Spec.js test/uriMangerSpec.js test/logging/json-format/jsonLoggingSpec.js test/logging/csv-format/csvLoggingSpec.js test/logging/text-format/textLoggingSpec.js --timeout 10000
scripts.test:integration: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha test/downloadSpec.js test/indexSpec.js test/pipeSpec.js test/recursivePipeSpec.js --timeout 60000
scripts.test:watch: mocha test/configCommandsSpec.js test/configManagerSpec.js test/chdirSpec.js test/getDestinationSpec.js test/historyCommandsSpec.js test/historyManagerSpec.js test/ipv6UtilsSpec.js test/uriManagerIPv6Spec.js test/uriMangerSpec.js test/logging/json-format/jsonLoggingSpec.js test/logging/csv-format/csvLoggingSpec.js test/logging/text-format/textLoggingSpec.js --watch --timeout 10000
scripts.test:coverage: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha test/*.js --timeout 60000
scripts.lint: eslint . && echo '✓ No linting errors found!'
scripts.lint:verbose: eslint . --debug 2>&1 | grep -E 'files found|Processing' && eslint . && echo '✓ No linting errors found!'

author: bingeboy
